0: Once Upon a Time in China and America

--------------------
Text: Once Upon a Time in China and America, also known as Once Upon a Time in China VI, is a 1997 Hong Kong martial arts film directed by Lau Kar-wing and Sammo Hung in his last directorial effort until "The Bodyguard", who also worked on the film's fight choreography.

1:
--------------------
Text: Once Upon a Time in China and America:  The film is the sixth and final installment in the "Once Upon a Time in China" film series.
